snippet: The Dream upset Connecticut and Indiana to reach the finals against Minnesota, whose rookie star, Maya Moore, is from Atlanta.
lead_paragraph: The Dream upset Connecticut and Indiana to reach the finals against Minnesota, whose rookie star, Maya Moore, is from Atlanta.

headline.main: In Atlanta, Hopes for a Title This Fall Rest on the Dream
headline.print_headline: In Atlanta, Hopes For a Title This Fall Rest on the Dream
headline.seo: Atlanta Sports Fans’ Hopes Now Rest With W.N.B.A. Team
